description.component: Image component with responsive behavior for the system image.

align.name: Aligning images
align.description: (optional) Align images with the helper float classes or text alignment classes. block-level images can be centered using the `.mx-auto` margin utility class.

responsive.name: Responsive image
responsive.description: (optional) Images in Bootstrap are made responsive with `.img-fluid`. This applies max-width with 100% and height with auto to the image so that it scales with the parent width.

thumbnails.name: Image thumbnails
thumbnails.description: (optional) In addition to Bootstrap border-radius utilities, you can use `.img-thumbnail` to give an image a rounded 1px border appearance.

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes that can be used to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom classes to this component.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: HTML attributes for the containing element.
